Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
AA \AA\ n. 1. acronym for {Associate in Arts}, a college degree granted for successful completion of a two-year course of study in arts or general topics.
Syn: Associate in Arts [WordNet 1.5]
2. Alcoholics Anonymous. [Acronym.] [WordNet 1.5] ||

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: aa n 1: a dry form of lava resembling clinkers 2: an international organization that provides a support group for persons trying to overcome alcoholism [syn: {Alcoholics Anonymous}] 3: an associate degree in arts [syn: {Associate in Arts}]
